website_summaries.verdict: 14 premium products assembled into one convenient package.
pros: Attention to detail in each aspect of the kit elevates the at-home car detailing experience for many types of cars and surfaces
14-piece set cleans your car from top to bottom
Clean, shine, and protect paint, wheels, tires, bumpers, and even the interior
Attempts to do it all from removing water spots to leaving chrome spotless and brilliant
cons: Given the price point, customers may expect the kit to come with brushes

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy this kit!
customer_reviews.text: Why would this 100$ kit come with a clay bar and no clay luber? I just watched the chemical guys video I need this lube to detail my car.. now I have to what? Buy more stuff and wait to get it? Nonsense!
customer_reviews.author: David Mascher

customer_reviews.title: Packages arrived damaged twice
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could use this product. It has been ordered twice and both times more than half the bottles arrived damaged and leaking. All of them are dented. This is very disappointing and I plan to switch brands in hopes of better luck. I’ll be returning this again.
customer_reviews.author: Rick S

customer_reviews.title: Great Pack from Chemical Guys
customer_reviews.text: Really like the Chemical Guys products overall. There waxes and cleaners are top notch and better than the basic premium brands you get at Auto Stores. Better than Mothers or Meguiars. I really like their products especially at the price point. This is a great pack that gets a lot of your essentials. I think this is a must for those wanting to protect their rides. Really love their "Butter Wet Wax" - easy on and easy off.
customer_reviews.author: GatorMan

customer_reviews.title: Great Products
customer_reviews.text: This is a great combo of products to get started into the world of quality car cleaning products. Some of them you only rarely or maybe never end up using depending on how serious you are (clay bar and swirl remover). The rest are regular go to products for cleaning your car. The wheel cleaner is especially good at removing break dust. After purchasing this I also picked up the leather cleaner and conditioner to pretty much finish off what I needed to detail my vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great kit, nice products
customer_reviews.text: This kit went on sale this spring and I bought it knowing I may not use each product due to a desire to use old products I was more familiar with. That being said, I really enjoyed the quality the wax, shine, wash glove and polish. All the products had a pleasant smell which was an added bonus. No sickening smells or residue.
customer_reviews.author: AZTony

customer_reviews.title: Good start but missed the target
customer_reviews.text: Great starter kit, good for the price. I personally would of bought it separately. Buttery wax and Speed wipe are the only things that are worth it. It comes with the clay bar but no clay lube? I would give it aa higher score if it came with lube or waterless wash. Oh and the glass cleaner is not very good compared to windex. Btw its in a Green bottle- the Blue one is Wheel cleaner!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quantity of product to price, excellent
customer_reviews.text: I had also bought the CG bucket with the grit guard that I found to be well worth the price. All products work as described if used as directed. However, i would have thought that the clay bar would be larger or two pieces; for larger Trucks and SUV.
customer_reviews.author: fnixon

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for a great price
customer_reviews.text: As the only girl in a house of guys who love their trucks and dirt bikes, I rarely get to use any of the car cleaning *anything*. I saw this deal and figured I would gift it to myself - and it really is a gift! Everything works exactly as it should, plus it smells nice. I was afraid the quality would be questionable because it was such a great price, but it’s not at all.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Backer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: This product is worth every dime. I used it to get the wax swirls off my paint and it did what it was designed for. Everything about this product is easy to use and it doesn’t take a lot of effort. It will have your ride showroom shiny if you take your time and do it right. I will definitely buy more when it runs out.
customer_reviews.author: S. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit
customer_reviews.text: Great starter kit for a amazing price. Caught it on sale for a amazing deal. Has everything you need to clean inside and out only thing you would need is a hose some soap and some microfibers and your on your way. Bonus is the glass cleaner can be used on your flat screen TV's in the house without any harm.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Senko

customer_reviews.title: Needs better directions for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if this was made for someone that doesn’t have detailing experience. I would have like to have some sort of directions on how to use and what order to use the products. I couldn’t find anything helpful on their website and no help from the contact phone number. Did the product work? Yes but very confusing and I am sure I need other items to use some of the product. I don’t see myself going back with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Bravo

customer_reviews.title: High quality products across the board.
customer_reviews.text: I used another good group of products for cleaning, polishing, etc. Not anymore, this stuff is amazing. Really impressed with the results. Everything worked as stated, the interior stuff and the wheel cleaner was better than anything I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Weissbrodt

customer_reviews.title: Great kit, really has everything you need (except the bucket and water)
customer_reviews.text: Got this on a lightning deal so it was a great value. Even at regular price its a solid value. Has everything you need to clean your car. Just a few extra tools and you can give your vehicle a close to professional detail inside and out.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Great but needs clay lube
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loved this gift. Lots of great stuff. Just beware that it comes with a clay bar but does not come with the clay lube you need to use with it and can only buy online. They should add that to this set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time using products from chemical guys, the wheel cleaner did an amazing job! I am also impressed by the tire shine and car wash soap. I used a foam cannon to apply it. Will defiantly recommend their products. I have purchased others products since this purchase
customer_reviews.author: BRAD

customer_reviews.title: Great brand
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my brother for a bday gift. To teach him how to take care of his vehicle. I love this brand of products.
customer_reviews.author: bob robich

customer_reviews.title: Best stuff ever!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband as a birthday gift since he had been wanting to try the products out. He said he will never buy any other brand. His mustang GT is his pride and joy and only deserves the best! Everything in here smells so good. Definitely worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Sam92

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed to get started. One note however to those who have never used a clay bar...you’ll need clay bar lubricant which isn’t included with this kit.
customer_reviews.author: LeonoraDC

customer_reviews.title: Great products
customer_reviews.text: I really like this small package from the Chemical Guys. I really hate detailing cars, but their products are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: J. Guilfoyle

customer_reviews.title: Great overall kit! Covers the basics.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed! Covers almost all the basics. Almost dinged it a star because I wish it had an interior detailer or cleaner. I don't use a mit to wash. Just use the foamer, rinse, and towel dry.Was concerned youd'd be able to tell I did the Speed Shine but I use it real lightly and nope, looks perfect and does not leave a residue on the glass either. Great overall kit.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger174

customer_reviews.title: Awesome detailing kit!
customer_reviews.text: As soon as this product arrived, I washed my car. Using the microfiber hand "sponge" was a breeze. All of the products worked great and left my car with a nice shine! Also, the interior cleaner smells like coconut, at least I think so but it is a nice smell. 10/10 would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: This is a money saver deal!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best deals for a car cleaning kit! I saved a ton of money. Chemical Guys have some of the best car detailing products around right now and you won't be disappointed with this deal.
customer_reviews.author: Cora Havron

customer_reviews.title: Perform as advertised
customer_reviews.text: After watching multiple videos on their detail products I ordered a selection and have been very impressed with the quality and performance of Chemical Guys products.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Radank

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my son, who details cars for a living and hobby. This are by far a superior product. Takes a ten year old car and makes it shine like new. All products smell pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Takacs

customer_reviews.title: The bottles they come in are complete junk.
customer_reviews.text: 3 of the 4 spray bottles that they come in showed up broken. 2 of them leak and don’t spray and the other one had no spray head on it. It was broken completely off. Very disappointed in how the product showed up. Will not be buying any chemical guys stuff again.
customer_reviews.author: Dylanyz250

customer_reviews.title: Great products but keep in mind the packing
customer_reviews.text: Great products but the packing can definitely improve. The inside of the box contained pink liquid as well as the bottle itself from the speed wipe bottle which led my hands with pink color when opening. Overall it’s worth the value.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Affordable & Great
customer_reviews.text: This product was hands down great and affordable! I would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Alberto Mateos

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged and leaking in box
customer_reviews.text: I love chemical guys products...but I received this kit damaged. 3 different bottles leaked all over the inside of the box. The box was undamaged so I'm not sure if it froze through shipment or defect from factory.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bang for you're buckk
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for anyone with a car detailing business. But make sure to catch chemical guys. when there having deals..there un beatable.. recommend:)
customer_reviews.author: jesse

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Makes your car look amazing, only reason i give it a 4 is for price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great car kit. Does what it says it does.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Salisbury

customer_reviews.title: I like it that it's a set.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a gift. I got this for my bother on his birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Great kit
customer_reviews.text: All products in this kit are great quality. Leaves my truck clean and looking glossy. Always get compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris T

customer_reviews.title: Wash mitt durability
customer_reviews.text: The chemicals/soaps in this kit are great and do a good job. The wash mitt looked great and worked well but after 5 washes the side seam stitching has come undone leaving a hole in the side the length of the mitt and green threads being left behind as you wash.
customer_reviews.author: SClaw

customer_reviews.title: Now my truck is shiny
customer_reviews.text: I've been really happy with these products so far, great value and smell
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Lee

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star Products
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Products. My Husband love all of The Chemical Guys products. This is a great starter set or to give as a gift to all the men in your life! Fast shipping, too!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Kyle Hoenstine

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great, but one product had spilled in the bag. The wheel cleaner did leak in the box all over the other products, but cleaned up well and all products are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner kit
customer_reviews.text: Good kit, a little bit of everything, some of the chemicals can be diluted some are run straight, read the labels. Tire shine is one of the better ones I’ve ever used
customer_reviews.author: Mike condo

customer_reviews.title: Washing your car has never been this fun.
customer_reviews.text: Chemical guys is my favorite choice when it comes to interior and exterior car care.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Trella

customer_reviews.title: PRICEY AND WORTH IT
customer_reviews.text: Very high end stuff--wish they gave better price points so I could buy more. OR AND I HOPE THEY SEE THIS.... ALLOW YOU TO PICK AND CHOOSE YOUR ITEMS INDIVIDUALLY FROM A LIST. They have a lot of products i want to try but can't afford to get in bundles like this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy hubby happy life 😊😊😊
customer_reviews.text: So worth every penny I spent, my husband enjoys detailing his car and now he does it with such motivation just to use your products
customer_reviews.author: Eliezer

customer_reviews.title: Uses a lot of product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome products but run out quickly when detailing whole vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Parsons

customer_reviews.title: GREAT DEAL! But they forgot my Butter wax
customer_reviews.text: Love chemical guys products but I bought this package because it’s a really good deal but they FORGOT!!! To put my butter wax in the package and gave me two citrus wash and gloss. Really bummed considering that a separate butter wax is $18
customer_reviews.author: andres s.

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Bought this just before we had a Chemical Guys store come to town. Glad I did so I just added from this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Lake brooks

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: It was a Christmas gift and my husband loved it!
customer_reviews.author: khousem

customer_reviews.title: Always great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Love these products. I use them as prizes For my truck shows every year!
customer_reviews.author: Ellie G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Kit for a Car Man
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my boyfriend who raved about this company before and loves washing his car. He really enjoys using these products.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: My son uses it every week to clean his truck. He's already asking for another set because his is getting low.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Elise

customer_reviews.title: This is a great car care kit product to use on your car
customer_reviews.text: This is a great car care kit product to use on your car. It works great!!! I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: F. BRIGGS

customer_reviews.title: Great deal! Better products
customer_reviews.text: Nice little sample/starter pack that let's you try some of their products!
customer_reviews.author: Sp0rt4320

customer_reviews.title: Look for a sale!
customer_reviews.text: Caught it on sale as part of the deal of the day and saved $40. Not sure it would be worth the original price, but I love chemical bros products.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Ohara

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good products. Better than the normal brands purchased at retail stores
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Great kit
customer_reviews.text: Awesome products in this kit, the soaps and cleaners are top quality and I haven’t been able to match the quality of the microfiber towels anywhere else
customer_reviews.author: I Mackey

customer_reviews.title: First time detailer, feels like a pro.
customer_reviews.text: This kit is amazing and comes with everything you need to get that pro detail look without breaking the bank. This was my first time detailing my car and I truly do feel like a pro shop couldn't do it much better. Due to time constraints I didn't even use the quick shine or the inner cleaner, but I'm am willing to bet it's awesome. I will be buying CG products from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a gift for Fathers Day and it came packaged perfect and everything was super efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Harper

customer_reviews.title: Sure Buy
customer_reviews.text: Used all 4 from my friend and went for all four great products mirror shine finish.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Luis Rodriguez Acevedo

customer_reviews.title: Clean cars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect car cleaning set. I am now hooked on Chemical Guys products.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Quality!!
customer_reviews.text: The best company out there!! Just using the wash alone had so many compliments on my black BMW.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey Uyeshiro

customer_reviews.title: Best products
customer_reviews.text: The best bang for your buc that you could buy from them.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Easy too use and gave my car her sexy back!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Love these products ended up buying almost everything they have to offer! Just wish this kit came with a bottle of clay luber to accompany the clay bar.
customer_reviews.author: Rafic Aouad

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this stuff, nothing bad to say about it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this kit
customer_reviews.text: I love this kit! I cannot wait to use it when the weather gets warmer on my new car. It really is a great value and it makes sense if car owners want a complete internal and external car care kit.
customer_reviews.author: Felicity Laird

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love their products. This package gave me everything I needed to detail my truck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We are very satisfied with good quality at a low price.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Jin Soo

customer_reviews.title: It was a gift for my husband and he absolutely ...
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my husband and he absolutely loves Chemical Guys products. It worked really well on his truck, it had not looked that clean since it was purchased. It helped take off the gunk from his vehicle and it didn't leave swirls.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Good starter kit
customer_reviews.text: Great starter kit for someone who wants to try chemical guys products for the first time for car Detailing. If your going to be Detailing a lot of cars I recommend buying product in 1 gallon or half gallon sizes rather than 16 ounces, that will save you a ton of money. But if you don't want to commit to that much product this kit allows you to test a lot of there products and see what works best for you. Definitely recommend chemical guys!
customer_reviews.author: Landin Davis

product_meta.title: Chemical Guys HOL123 Complete Car Care Kit (14 Items), 112 fl. oz
product_meta.description: Style:Complete Car Care KitThe Chemical Guys' complete car care kit empowers automotive enthusiasts worldwide to clean, restore, and protect their most treasured investments. This complete car care kit features every product the enthusiast or weekend warrior detailer needs to keep their car looking its very best start by washing away abrasive filth and dirt with Mr. Pink car wash Shampoo and the chenille microfiber wash mitt for a scratch-free shine. Blast away brake dust and restore deep gloss and shine to wheels, rims, tires, and brake parts with signature series wheel cleaner. Decontaminate paintwork and make it feel smooth as glass with the OG Yellow clay bar and synthetic clay lubber, then remove any pesky swirls and scratches with vss scratch and swirl remover. SHINE and protect paint, metal, and glass against pollution, UV sunlight, birds, and bugs with a good coat of Butter wet wax spread to perfection with the ufo foam applicator pads. Restore that just-waxed look with speed wipe quick detail spray to remove fingerprints, bird droppings, and light dirt in between full washes, and always wipe with the 3 included professional grade Premium microfiber towels for scratch-free wiping on any painted or polished surface. Finish off every detail by removing dust and fingerprints from dashboards, door panels, and steering wheels with inner clean interior quick detail spray, and make tires and bumpers look deep black and brand new with a crisp coating of Silk shine dressing.
feature_bullets: Amazing Value:Contains 14 of Chemical Guys best products: (1) OG Clay Bar, (1) 16 Ounce Silk Shine Dressing, (1) 16 Ounce Signature Series Wheel Cleaner, (1) Chenille Microfiber Wash Mitt, (1) 16 Ounce Inner Clean Interior Quick Detailer, (1) 16 Ounce Speed Wipe Quick Detailer, (1) 16 Ounce Butter Wet Wax, (1) 16 Ounce Mr. Pink Car Wash Soap, (1) 16 Ounce Scratch & Swirl Remover, (2) UFO Foam Applicator pads and (3) Professional Grade Microfiber Towels

MAKES A GREAT GIFT: This kit is the ultimate collection of car wash supplies, and is the gift that keeps on giving for any car buff, truck enthusiast or classic car fan; It contains everything needed to clean and maintain a beautiful shine on any car or truck
WORKS ON ALL CARS, TRUCKS & SUVS: Old car, New SUV, Black car, Red car, New or used, any color this kit can help you make your interior and exterior look its best

THE No.1 BRAND IN CAR CARE: Beginners and professionals alike choose Chemical Guys, not only for the finest car care products, but the world class customer support and vast detailing knowledge; Chemical Guys is more than a brand it's a lifestyle with a worldwide following
SATISFACTION GUARANTEED: Our customers love our products; We love our products, and we want to make sure you love them too

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars338 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
